name: roads
summary: Extract road network with attributes and geometry calculations
description:
The roads command extracts the road network from an OSM file with comprehensive attributes:

- Road classification (primary, secondary, residential, etc.)
- Road name and reference numbers
- Speed limits (tagged or estimated from road type)
- Surface type and smoothness
- Lane count and lane-kilometers
- One-way restrictions
- Length, sinuosity, and bearing
- Infrastructure flags (sidewalk, lighting, bridges, tunnels)

Supports filtering by road hierarchy levels and infrastructure type.

options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv, shapefile
options.--class: Road class: major, minor, path, all

output:
GeoJSON/Shapefile with properties:
- id: OSM way ID
- highway: Road type
- name: Road name
- ref: Reference number (e.g., A1, M25)
- maxspeed: Speed limit
- lanes: Number of lanes
- surface: Road surface type
- oneway: One-way restriction
- length_m: Length in meters
- length_km: Length in kilometers
- sinuosity: Curvature ratio (1.0 = straight)
- bearing: Direction in degrees
- speed_kph: Effective speed
- travel_min: Travel time in minutes
- lane_km: Lane-kilometers
- has_sidewalk: Sidewalk present
- is_lit: Street lighting
- bridge: Bridge type
- tunnel: Tunnel type
